post.text: "Hillary Clinton understands that our diversity is one of our greatest strengths." â€”Bernie Sanders endorsing Hillary

comment.author: Katherine
comment.text: Hillary wants us all to believe that she has great family values and that her devoted husband Bill is still the love of her life and supports her every move...so where was Bill while she was being grilled by the FBI at their home on the 4th of July holiday? If he was anywhere but at her side he isn't much of a husband.

replies.author: Sage
replies.text: Having trouble finding your Trump Train? Oh snap! It's derailed!
